parameter.value: Hm. I don't think you need another one of my counterspells to cross the barrier on Goroma.
Mysterious Voodoo Skull,5669,4000;Enigmatic Voodoo Skull,5670,4000;black skull,9969,4000;blood herb,2798,500;blood goblet,9447,10000;
Be greeted, child. What do you want in an old shaman's hut?
Well, I currently buy mysterious and enigmatic voodoo skulls and a few other things I might need for my rituals.
